title: 9(1) of the Institutional Burials Act 2022 (No. 18 of 2022), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Institutional Burials Act 2022
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Institutional Burials Act 2022 
(Establishment of Office of Director of Authorised Intervention, Tuam) Order
text_norm: 1 order may cited institutional burial act 2022 (establishment office director authorised intervention tuam) order

title: 9(1) of the Institutional Burials Act 2022 (No. 18 of 2022), hereby order as
9(1) of the Institutional Burials Act 2022 (No. 18 of 2022), hereby order as
heading: (a) The 20th day of March 2023 is appointed as the day on which an
text_raw:
2. 

(a) The 20th day of March 2023 is appointed as the day on which an 
Office of Director of Authorised Intervention shall stand 
established. 

(b) The Office of Director of Authorised Intervention established 
under paragraph (a) shall continue in operation for a period of 
30 months from the date that Office stands established under 
that paragraph. 

(c) The Director shall be called and known as the Director of 

Authorised Intervention, Tuam. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

2 March, 2023. 

RODERIC O'GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 24th March, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [87] 3
